com.notification

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notification.Notification
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WindowNotification

    public abstract class Notification
extends Object
    Provides the core methods that a Notification needs.

    • Method Detail

      • addNotificationListener

        public void addNotificationListener(NotificationListener listener)
        Listens for events on the Notification (e.g., a click).
        Parameters:
        listener - the NotificationListener to add

      • removeNotificationListener

        public void removeNotificationListener(NotificationListener listener)
        Removes a listener for events on the Notification (e.g., a click).
        Parameters:
        listener - the NotificationListener to remove

      • isManaged

        public boolean isManaged()
        Returns:
        whether or not this Notification has been added to a NotificationManager

      • getNotificationManager

        public NotificationManager getNotificationManager()
        Returns:
        the NotificationManager managing this Notification

      • setNotificationManager

        protected void setNotificationManager(NotificationManager manager)

      • removeFromManager

        public void removeFromManager()
        Removes the Notification from the Manager. In some cases, this has the same effect as calling hide(); however, hide() doesn't invoke Manager-related things like fading, etc.

      • fireListeners

        protected void fireListeners(String action)

        public abstract void show()
        Reveals the Notification on the desktop.

      • hide

        public abstract void hide()
        Hides the Notification on the desktop.

        public abstract boolean isShown()
        Returns:
